description:
Deep in the remote mountains of the borderlands, lives a weak-legged man named Ashiyowa. He, who satisfies the requirements of the king who is “searching for his older brother” who has gone missing, arrives in the capital for the first time .

Told by the king that he is his brother, he is taken to the palace.

King x Illegitimate Older Brother>
